Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Obstetric Labor Complications/Uterine Rupture
Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Female/Uterine Diseases/Uterine Rupture
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A complete separation or tear in the wall of the UTERUS with or without expulsion of the FETUS. It may be due to injuries, multiple pregnancies, large fetus, previous scarring, or obstruction.
